document.id: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2015-2
document.heading: Amending Section 3.54.060, “Sewer Connection Charges,” and Section 3.54.090, “South Trunk Sewer Area Impact Fee” of the San Mateo Municipal Code to Allow Sewer Connection Charges and South Trunk Sewer Area Impact Fees to Be Set by Resolution

citations.citation: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2015-2
